Quickstrike:




Quickstrike looked around. He was unhappy with his new surroundings 
in the new base. Along with that, some kind of activity was going on 
that he wasn't much informed of. It tugged at him to find out.

He opened up his comm-link to Black Arachnia. "Hey, sugar-bot where 
are ya. We need t' talk. In private."
